porter.translation[0].definitions[0].def: someone whose job is to carry people’s bags at railway stations, airports etc
porter.translation[0].definitions[1].def: someone in charge of the entrance to a hotel, hospital etc
porter.translation[0].definitions[2].def: someone whose job is to carry heavy goods at markets
porter.translation[0].definitions[3].def: someone whose job is to look after the part of a train where people sleep
porter.translation[0].definitions[4].def: someone whose job is to look after a building by cleaning it, repairing things etc
porter.translation[1].definitions[0].def: someone whose job is to carry people’s bags, for example at railway stations, airports etc
porter.translation[1].definitions[1].def: someone whose job is to help guests arriving at a hotel
